name: HiSummer
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Hi Summer ceiling fan.”
”Alexa, set the Hi Summer fan speed to medium.”
”Alexa, set the Hi Summer light brightness to fifty percent.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enhance your living space with the HiSummer Smart Ceiling Fan skill for Alexa, bringing the perfect blend of comfort, convenience, and style into your home. Control your HiSummer ceiling fan and light using simple voice commands with Alexa.

With this skill, you can effortlessly manage fan speeds, adjust lighting, and create the ideal ambiance for any room in your home.

Core Functionality:
- Fan Speed Control : Set your ceiling fan to low, medium, or high speed.
- Light Control : Turn your ceiling fan light on or off using voice commands.
- Color Adjustment : Change the LED light colors using an RGB spectrum for customized lighting.
- Brightness Adjustment : Adjust the brightness of the light to your preference.

Getting Started:
1. Installation and Setup :
 Install your HiSummer smart ceiling fan following the provided manual.
2. Download the HiSummer App :
 Available on the App Store and Google Play Store.
3. Account Creation :
 Create a new account and log into the HiSummer App.
4. Connect to Wi-Fi :
 Ensure your HiSummer ceiling fan is connected to your home Wi-Fi network through the app.
5. Enable the Skill :
 Open the Alexa app and search for "HiSummer Smart Ceiling Fan".
 Enable the skill and link your HiSummer account with Alexa.
6. Discover Devices :
 Use the Alexa app or voice command “Alexa, discover my devices” to find your HiSummer ceiling fan.

Prerequisites:
- A HiSummer smart ceiling fan with light.
- HiSummer mobile app for initial setup and configuration.
- An active Wi-Fi connection.
- An Amazon Alexa-enabled device.

Restrictions:
This skill currently supports English (US) language.
Available for users in the United States.

Additional Information:
HiSummer is dedicated to providing top-quality products that combine cutting-edge technology with eco-friendly materials. Our ceiling fans are designed to operate quietly and efficiently, ensuring a comfortable and sustainable living environment. For any technical support or assistance, our dedicated team is here to help you make the most out of your HiSummer smart ceiling fan.
